name: David Kim
title: VP Engineering
bio: 15+ years building teams and products at Google. Expert in system design and engineering leadership.

name: Lisa Martinez
title: Director of Product
bio: Led product strategy for Instagram Stories and Reels. Expert in product management and growth.

title: Principal Scientist
bio: ML expert who built recommendation systems for Amazon Prime. Specializes in data science and AI.

title: Engineering Manager
bio: Scaled Netflix's streaming platform to 200M+ users. Expert in distributed systems and leadership.

title: Staff Engineer
bio: Core iOS framework developer. Expert in mobile development and performance optimization.

title: Design Director
bio: Led design for Airbnb's host experience. Expert in user research and product design.

title: CTO
bio: Built Stripe's payment infrastructure. Expert in fintech and scalable systems.

bio: Led data science initiatives for Uber's pricing and matching algorithms. Expert in machine learning.
